channel.title: An easy fix for u !jar file
channel.description:
http://snag.gy/6yM0U.jpg
as u can see im getting that "invalid keystore format" error while signing into the jar file, however iv tested the jar iv made in my desktop and its working. but when i try signing into the jar file i get this error, whats wrong? also do i even need to sign in when my client works?

item.title: An easy fix for u !jar file
item.dc:creator: @warxscape warxscape
item.description:
@warxscape wrote:

[quote=“Vain_, post:2, topic:527749”]Did you generate a keystore?
If so, change the keystore location to the keystore file.[/quote]

i followed https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,490803.0.html
and it said just right “certificate” there, same did the other tutorials, iv also tried what uv told me however that aint worked too

atm iv got this,

http://snag.gy/WBHVB.jpg

EDIT: NVM FIXED, someone can lock this now

EDIT: fuck i didnt save the jar file at the end before closing it, did i need to?

Read full topic
item.source: An easy fix for u !jar file

item.title: An easy fix for u !jar file
item.dc:creator: @Vain1 Vain_
item.description:
@Vain1 wrote:

Did you generate a keystore?
If so, change the keystore location to the keystore file.
